name: S.P.A.C.E.
description:
👑 Plot Summary

Nick sneaks into an enemy spaceship with a motive of destroying it and escaping.

✨ Story

Somewhere in outer space, there's a spaceship of S.P.A.C.E organization floating around led by their boss Cypher. S.P.A.C.E is trying to find power sources which when combined make a weapon powerful enough to cause destruction beyond heal. These power sources are found mostly around planet Kepler. By extraction of these power sources, the natural resources at Kepler's are depleting. Nick, a fighter from Kepler-2356S finally manages to locate the spaceship and decides to stop them from creating any further chaos. For this Nick has to get into the spaceship, find Cypher, kill him and get out from the place overcoming all the obstacles and challenges on the way.

P.S: Read the objectives carefully!
